testcase.name: should compare two temperature sensors with different unit
should convert Fahrenheit to Fahrenheit - returns the same object
should not allow to instantiate precipitation with C
should not allow to instantiate precipitation with F
should not allow to instantiate precipitation with %
should compare two temperature sensors with same unit
should convert Celsius to Celsius - returns the same object
should not allow to instantiate humidity with C
should not allow to instantiate humidity F
should not allow to instantiate humidity with mm
should not allow to instantiate temperature with %
should not allow to instantiate temperature with mm
should not allow to convert humidity to temperature
should not allow to convert precipitation to temperature
